name: Yuca's Adventure
description:
Yuca's Adventures is a Grappling Hook Tactical Adventure game that takes you on a journey with Yuca, a young and brave Cassava, who sets out to find out what is wrong with the Rain that is affecting the Sacred Cassava in their village.

Take control of Yuca and embark on a dangerous journey toward the sky by climbing a large tree, where you will face different challenges and obstacles.

This game was a submission to the Global Game Jam 2023.

Important: To run the game on Linux, you must right-click the file, select properties, and set it as executable.

If your game closes suddenly, running the executable file again may solve the problem.
